news.title: Amazon may launch a marketplace where media sites can sell their content to AI companies
news.summary: A new report claims the e-commerce giant is looking to create a pipeline of licensable content between media publishers and AI companies.

news.title: An ice dance duo skated to AI music at the Olympics

news.title: Boston Dynamics CEO Robert Playter steps down after 30 years at the company

news.title: VC Masha Bucher, Epstein associate and Day One founder, explains herself
news.summary: After numerous news reports documented Masha Bucher's close business and personal relationship with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, Bucher took to X to explain.

news.title: Google sent personal and financial information of student journalist to ICE
news.summary: The tech giant handed over the personal information of a journalist and student who attended a pro-Palestinian protest in 2024. This is the latest example of ICE using its controversial subpoena powers to target people critical of the Trump administration.

news.title: Amazon Ring’s Super Bowl ad sparks backlash amid fears of mass surveillance
news.summary: Ring's new Search Party feature has once again drawn backlash for the company. A 30-second ad that aired during Sunday's Super Bowl showed Ring cameras "surveilling" neighborhoods to locate a lost dog. news.title: RFK Jr. Says Americans Need More Protein. His Grok-Powered Food Website Disagrees
news.summary: The site Realfood.gov uses Elon Musk’s Grok chatbot to dispense nutrition information—some of which contradicts the government’s new guidelines.

news.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp Recorded a Video About ICE for His Employees
news.summary: In a video shared with Palantir employees, Alex Karp did not explain how ICE is utilizing the company’s products. Instead, workers were told they can sign NDAs if they want detailed information.
